summary: This document appears to be an excerpt from a legal filing or affidavit describing an alleged incident of sexual abuse at Jeffrey Epstein's ranch in New Mexico. It details how Ghislaine Maxwell pressured a minor victim to undress and receive a massage, which Maxwell then performed in a sexual manner while Epstein watched.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is present at his ranch in New Mexico with Ghislaine Maxwell and the victim. The victim is described as being alone and afraid with him and Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is described as pressuring the victim to receive a massage, directing her to undress, leaving a door open for Epstein to watch, and then touching the victim's intimate parts against her will for the sexual benefit of herself and Epstein.

connections.description: They are together at Epstein's ranch, with Maxwell allegedly acting to facilitate sexual abuse for the benefit of both herself and Epstein.
Both are described as perpetrators against the unnamed victim, with Maxwell performing the physical acts and Epstein watching.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Abuse at Epstein's New Mexico Ranch
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell pressured a minor victim to undress and receive a massage. Maxwell then touched the victim's intimate parts against her will for the sexual benefit of herself and Jeffrey Epstein, who watched through an open door.

events.title: Victim's Return to Epstein's Ranch
events.description: The victim returned to Jeffrey Epstein's ranch in New Mexico after going to a movie with Epstein and Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document alleges Ghislaine Maxwell sexually touched a minor victim against her will at Jeffrey Epstein's New Mexico ranch.
Maxwell left a door open during the massage so that Jeffrey Epstein could watch the victim while she was naked.
The victim was a child, isolated at a massive ranch away from her family, with no access to a phone or means of escape without Epstein or Maxwell knowing.
The abuse is described as being for the sexual benefit of both Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
